Takes time to be twisted, or not

git essentials

2015-08-04 #git #version control

configure user name/email and color.ui

git config --global user.name
git config --global user.email 
git config --global color.ui true

Basic steps for git, untracked —– tracked/stage —— commit

git init 
git status
git add
git commit -m ""
git log
